meanings.definition: To adapt for a new use or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She repurposed an old shirt into a cleaning rag.
meanings.sent2: The old barn was repurposed into a cozy guest house.
meanings.sent3: He repurposed the broken chair leg as a doorstop.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity repurposed the mundane into something extraordinary.
meanings.sent5: The artist repurposed scrap metal into a stunning sculpture.

meanings.definition: Used in a different way than originally intended.
meanings.sent1: The repurposed toolbox served as a unique planter.
meanings.sent2: The repurposed fabric made a quirky patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent3: The repurposed umbrella became a makeshift sunshade.
meanings.sent4: Her repurposed jewelry box held more than just jewelry.
meanings.sent5: The repurposed shipping container became a trendy tiny home.
